description:
If you are finding that sunglasses aren't providing all the protection you want, try the Shore goggles. Ride tight trees and rubble strewn paths with these super-vented goggles. Intake vents move warm air off the lenses, and, like thermal windows on a house, the dual lens helps with temperature changes that can cause fogging. Broad lens allows good peripheral and downward vision.

  • Dual layer polycarbonate lens has tear-away posts
  • Face foam is comfortable and hypoallergenic
  • Flexible frame fits a variety of face shapes
  • Intake vents keep your vision clear and lenses free of fog
  • Silicone-ribbed strap stays in place
  • Design is helmet compatible
name: Ryders Eyewear Shore Goggles - Unisex
